definitions.title: vb. Niph.
definitions.body: be heaped up (cf. Sab. [[אערמחו]] pl. of [[[ערם]]] dam, so Ar. 9arimun cf. DHM:ZMG xxx (1876), 676; VOJ i. 25 who cp. BH [[עֲרִמָה]] Ar. 9aramah;un (which Frä:135 thinks Aram. loan-word), cf. 9ram Pa. heap up; > Wetzst:Zeitschr. für Ethnol. 1873, 279 (Syr. Dreschtafel) who cp. 9arama strip [whence [[עַרְמוֹן]] infr.], and thinks [[עֲרֵמָה]] = bare heap);- Pf. 3 pl. [[נֶעֶרְמוּ מַיִם]] Ex 15:8.
